import Logo from '../logo/logo' import select from './select.svg' import './landingPage.css' const LandingPage = () => { const isOnScreen = (el) => { return (el.getBoundingClientRect().y < window.scrollY - el.getBoundingClientRect().height/2) } const clickNav = (e) => { document.querySelectorAll(".nav a li").forEach(el => { if (el.classList.contains('active')) el.classList.toggle('active') }) if (!e.target.classList.contains('active')) e.target.classList.toggle('active') } document.addEventListener('scroll',()=>{ document.querySelectorAll('.counter').forEach(el => { if (isOnScreen(el) && !el.classList.contains('done')){ let h = el.querySelector('.h'); let t = el.querySelector('.t'); let o = el.querySelector('.o'); let c = el.querySelector('.c'); let numbers = [h,t,o]; let data = el.getAttribute('data-number'); setInterval(()=>{ numbers.forEach(x => { x.innerHTML = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10); }) },5000) } }) }) return ( <>
